wikipedia_page.main: John Waugh (born 1889) was a Scottish footballer who played mainly as an inside right for clubs including Heart of Midlothian, Ayr Parkhouse, Hamilton Academical, Raith Rovers and Motherwell. He played for Hamilton in the 1911 Scottish Cup Final, lost to Celtic after a replay.

response: * John Waugh (footballer, born 1892) (1892–?), Scottish footballer for Gillingham
* John Waugh (footballer, born 1889) (1889–?), Scottish footballer for Hamilton Academical and Motherwell
* John Waugh (bishop) (1656–1734), English churchman, bishop of Carlisle from 1723
